author: Ed Baines
method: Heat the oven to 220C/425F/Gas 7. Roll out the pastry and cut into thin strips. Lay onto a baking sheet in a twist shape. Bake in the oven for 8-10 minutes or until golden and risen. Leave to cool, then sprinkle with icing sugar and cinnamon.  Drizzle with honey and serve.
ingredients: 300g/10½oz ready-made puff pastry,  1 tsp icing sugar,  ½ tsp cinnamon,  drizzle honey
